程序包 nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.recorder

类 Recorder

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.recorder.Recorder
public class Recorder
extends java.lang.Object
Class that records and stores action records and uses them to replay games.
作者:
Samual

      The constructor for the recorder.

  • 方法详细资料

    • saveAction

      public void saveAction​(Direction key, java.lang.String actor, int time)
      Adds a new actionrecord to the queue
      参数:
      key - Direction the direction the actor is moving in
      actor - String the id of the actor that is moving
      time - int the time the move was made

    • saveAll

      public void saveAll​(java.lang.String filename, int level)
      Saves every actionrecord in the actionqueue to a file.
      参数:
      filename - Name of the file the information is saved to

    • loadAll

      public void loadAll​(java.lang.String name)
      Populates the actionqueue with actionrecords from a xml file.
      参数:
      name - Name of the xml file containing the actions

    • replay

      public void replay​(App app, double increment)
      Replays actions based on the actionqueue.
      参数:
      app -

    • step

      public Domain step​(Domain finishedBoard, int time)
      Applies the most recent action to a board and returns it. Applies every move with a similar time too.
      参数:
      finishedBoard - The board that the action is applied to
      time - Used to determine if other actions should be applied "simultaneously"
      返回:
      The finished board

    • step

      public Domain step​(Domain finishedBoard)
      Applies the most recent action to the board and returns it.

    • getDomain

      public Domain getDomain()
      Getter for the board.
      返回:
